pkgmetadata.longdescription: Epidemiological Data Analysis // This is a tool for epidemiologist, medical data analyst, medical or public health professionals. It contains three domains of functions: functions for 1) data management, 2) statistical analysis and 3) calculating epidemiological measures. The calculations are mainly based on three books, 1) Betty R. K, (2006, ISBN:9780865428713), 2) B. Burt Gerstman (2013, ISBN:978-1-4443-3608-5) and 3) Douglas G Altman (2005, ISBN:0 7279 1375 1).
